extensions.name: AP_PieMenus
extensions.description:
This script is an example implementation of a pie menu for Harmony, using the openHarmony framework.
This script uses the scripting library openHarmony and will not work if it's not installed. Install it from the store for this to work.

Use the extension ScriptShortcuts to set a shortcut to this function or add it to your scripting toolbar.

v1.0.1: Doesn't connect empty palette if no scene palette present. Requires openHarmony 0.2.8
extensions.author: Adam Phillips
